column1: Smoque BBQ////Awesome barbeque but I have to be in the mood for the drive and/or have a serious barbeque craving to go.  Parking is a bit of a beast as well but you can't go wrong here.  This is hands down some of THE best barbeque in Chicago.  It's southern barbeque done right!!!!  I had St. Louis slab of ribs with a side of macaroni and a corn muffin.  My husband and I were definitely impressed.  The place is always crowded so order ahead and Enjoy!
